summary.span: 获取或设置要用作排序条件的属性名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the property name being used as the sorting criteria.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应该是基础集合中的项的公共属性。This property should be a public property of the items in the underlying collection. 字符串由 排序中所涉及的特定对象解释。The string is interpreted by the particular object involved in the sorting. 仅支持简单的列名称。 only supports simple column names. 支持常规属性路径和 `XPath` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 数据。 supports general property paths and `XPath` for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. 因此，当视图是对象时 ，可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 基于这些节点的属性对中的节点进行排序 。Therefore, when the view is a object, you can sort [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes in an based on an attribute of those nodes. 例如，如果属性名称为 `Cost` ，则 @Cost 在中指定 "" 。For example, if the attribute name is `Cost`, you would specify "@Cost" for the in the .
